alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 5:09PM EST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Okaloosa and northeastern Santa Rosa Counties through 500 PM CST... At 408 PM CST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Jay, or 15 miles north of Milton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baker and Laurel Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CST for south central Alabama...and northwestern Florida.
